April 25, 1955
Mr. Kenneth D. Wright
Director of Broadcasting
University of Tennessee
Knoxville, Tennessee
Dear Ken:
Will the Program Planning Committee accept the responÂ¬
sibility for providing headquarters with a Radio Program Idea
each month for inclusion with the mailing of the Newsletter.
This is in line with our discussion at Atlanta. It is my
idea that your committee would provide one idea for a program
or program series each month on two pages or less (one sheet)
so that this can be passed along to the program directors of
our member stations.
Sincerely,
Frank E. Schooley
President
FES:js
cc: Dr. H. J. Skornia
P.S. Could we have the first one by May 20?
